short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your Bitcoin, Ethereum, XRP, Litecoin, XLM, and over 300 other coins and tokens.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Web3 Atomic Wallet is a non-custodial, decentralized wallet that gives you full control over your funds. By managing your own backup phrase and private keys, you ensure your assets are secure. 

With Web3 Atomic Wallet Extension you can:
- Send & Receive Crypto instantly
- Swap on Dex 
- Stake & Earn
- Buy and view NFT
- Lend Crypto

Swap with Popular DEX 
Easily exchange tokens using Uniswap, SushiSwap, PancakeSwap, and more. Just connect your wallet to these platforms directly through their websites and start swapping.

Stake Tokens for Rewards
Earn passive income by staking your tokens by connecting your wallet to popular staking platforms such as Lido, Rocket Pool, or Binance Staking through their websites.

Exceptional security
Your private keys are encrypted on your device and never leave it. Only you have access to your funds. Atomic is built on top of common open source libraries.

Decentralization and Anonymity
Atomic is a fully decentralized wallet. We don't store any of your data, don't require any verification for basic services. We never have access to your funds.

24/7 Live support
Our engineers are always happy to assist you by email support@atomicwallet.io or live telegram chat @AtomicWallet.

Smooth and handy interface
We are focusing on exceptional user experience. App is fully optimized for your browser.

Supported cryptocurrencies
- Ethereum (ETH)
- Binance Chain (BSC)
- Polygon (MATIC)
- Optimism (OPT)
- ERC20 all tokens and many more
